item.description:
Girl's Night!

So what are we going to do for Girl's Night? PAJAMA PARTY THEME!

This Month's Girl's Night:
1. Date: Saturday, January 8th
2. Location: Rebecca's House in Limington
3. Host: Rebecca
4. Theme: Pajama Party


Please wear your comfy pajamas, bring a pillow, teddy bear, blanket, or sleeping bag to make it fun and add to the effect. This isn't a sleepover, just a themed evening!. Also, please sign up to bring one of the following by adding a comment AT THE BOTTOM OF THIS PAGE:

1. One board game to play with the group.
2. One board game to play with the group.
3. Chocolate ice cream, French vanilla ice cream, Strawberry ice cream (2 separate containers, ie NOT neapolitan as some people may be allergic to strawberries).
4. Sundae Sauces - chocolate sauce, caramel sauce, berry sauces
5. Sundae Toppings - whip cream, nuts, jimmies, cherries
6. 1 bottle of Malibu Coconut Rum
7. Pineapple Juice & Cranberry Juice (2 bottles of each)
8. Popcorn & Candy
9. 1 bottle of champagne
10. Paper bowls & spoons for ice cream
11. A dessert to share with the group
12. 1 large Cheese Pizza
13. 1 large Pepperoni Pizza
14. 1 large Veggie Pizza (2 toppings)
*(You can order and pick up pizza on your way here at Standish House of Pizza - Phone number 642-3333. Website http://www.standishho....
15-20. Once the items above have been spoken for, please sign up to bring an item that reminds you of sleep overs when you were a child. It could be food, a game, etc. Please list what you decide to bring below.

You do not need to spend a lot. Our goal is to spend less than $10-15 for each item. Keep in mind that there will be around 20 women attending.

So what will we do? We'll watch movies, make ice cream sundaes, play some games, and enjoy the evening!

I hope to see you there!
item.name: Girls Night! Theme: Pajama Party Theme
